page.title: 11CHILDREN AT SCHOOL
page.content: In 1985 there are{5 children}at Lismore School, with{one}headteacher and a{part-time}teacher particularly for{Gaelic. The school was built in{1965}and extended in 1970 because its numbers reached{40.}It has its own{kitchen}and {school meals supervisor,}and{one {part-time cleaner.}Children are taken to and from school by{car. We have a large field{playground}and {climbing frames.}There is a{piano,}a {television}and a{computer. Parents are always{generous}to School needs. A{Playgroup}meets on Thursdays and {Cubs}on Fridays. We welcome{visits from children from other schools. Children go from Lismore at about{12 to be{weekly boarders}at{Oban High {School. One girl}went this summer. There are{5 Lismore children}at Oban High School now.
